variant.p: Furthermore, the IFRIC noted that dividend income, regardless of whether it is in the form of cash or non‑cash assets, is within the scope of IAS 18 Revenue and is required to be measured at the fair value of the consideration received. Although the Interpretation does not address the accounting by the recipient of the non‑cash distribution, the IFRIC concluded that the Interpretation did not impose a more onerous requirement on the entity that makes the distribution than IFRSs have already imposed on the recipient of the distribution.
